Name: Waltz of the Wizard: Natural Magic
About the game: *** Winner - UploadVRâ€™s Best Of 2021 Awards - Best Updated Game *** ðŸ“œ Description Welcome to the world that makes fantasy a reality in ways that anyone can enjoy, set in detailed environments full of humor, hidden secrets and interdimensional beings. This unique VR experience is designed to make you feel present in another reality, where everything is interactive and characters feel alive. A reality experience that showcases what VR does that no other medium can, combining cutting-edge presence features like hand tracking (Currently exclusive for Valve Index controllers), gestures and voice interaction to let you experience fantastical situations and intuitively wield superpowers as if it were all real. ðŸ”¹ Highlight Features Cutting-edge voice, hand- and gesture interaction abilities Believable characters with hundreds of reactions Large campaign with storyline, combat and challenges Hours of content, hundreds of interactions & countless secrets ðŸ”¨ Active Development Aldin has been pushing the limits of VR for years and is actively developing more content for Natural Magic, continuing the mission to make you truly feel present in a believable reality, pioneering simulations, interactive characters, hand-tracking and gestures for a unique and immersive experience. Natural Magic adds a massive collection of new content and replayability, introducing a unique magic physics engine thatâ€™s entirely new to VR, conjured and controlled through natural movement as if magic were real. Venture into the fortress to recover lost artifacts from beings that harness magic to control time and space, or have fun in a friendly wizard tower and courtyard full of strange oddities. Cast creative and diverse spells in a fully interactive world, discovering the many details of a world designed to feel real. Combine arcane ingredients into a boiling cauldron with the help of an ancient spirit trapped in a human skull. Travel to new places, finding yourself in mysterious circumstances full of detail and unforgettable atmosphere.
